summary: 2009 GMC YUKON. I HAVE OWNED MY GMC FOR APPROXIMATELY 4 YEARS AND FOR THE SECOND TIME, I AM DEALING WITH A HORRIBLY CRACKED DASH. THE DEALERSHIP ADDRESSED THE ISSUE SHORTLY AFTER PURCHASING THE VEHICLE DUE TO IT CRACKING JUST A COUPLE OF MONTHS OF HAVING IT. AND, HERE WE GO AGAIN. IT IS CRACKED FROM DRIVER SIDE TO PASSENGER SIDE AND IT IS UP TO MY WALLET TO GET IT FIXED. I TAKE SUPER CARE OF MY VEHICLE, INSIDE AND OUT AND THIS IS DISGUSTING BEYOND BELIEF. I AM BEYOND FRUSTRATED AND VOW TO NEVER PURCHASE ANOTHER FROM GMC. OWN YOUR ISSUES GMC!!!

MY BRAKES LOCKED UP WHILE I WAS DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD DUE TO THE PIN COMING LOSE IN THE CALIPAR.  I HAD TO TAKE IT TO FORD TO GET IT FIXED, AND THIS WAS LAST JUNE .  NOW I AM HAVING THE SAME ISSUE WITH THE BRAKES BY MAKING A LOUD SQUEALING ANNOYING NOISE AS I AM DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD.  THIS IS THE 2ND TIME IN A YEAR THAT I HAVE HAD PROBLEMS WITH MY BRAKES.  I HAVE HAD TO REPLACE 2 OF THE MOTORS MOUNTS 4 OR 5 MONTHS AFTER I BOUGHT MY CAR.  *TT
